name: mob.is.it
description: Your mobile website. Easy, fast, free.
overview:
mob.is.it is the online tool for building mobile optimized websites and web apps. Its simple CMS allows anybody to create mobile sites that look and work perfectly across a huge range of devices, looking native on iPhone and Android smartphones while being optimized for all other phones also. Prices are very affordable and all plans have a 21 days no-obligations-no-credit-card free trial.

The mobile CMS used to for building and managing sites and pages is very easy and straightforward, letting users add and edit content with a few clicks and allowing them to customize the look and feel of the mobile website quickly and effectively.

Pages are created choosing their “type” among an ample and growing library of widgets so that minimum effort is required to accomplish a complex result. For example to create an RSS list only the RSS feed URL is required - same approach for a contact form, a YouTube channel page, a Facebook Fan Page or a Twitter stream.

The mobile website / web app created is truly cross device as it is produced in 3 versions:

  • one optimized for iPhone and Android devices (WebKit browsers) using an advanced HTML5 framework thus delivering a native-like experience
  • one optimized for non-webkit touch smartphones (Nokia C6, Windows Phone)
  • one optimized for older/non-touch devices (BlackBerry’s, older Nokia’s) that looks and behaves well also on these featurephones

Web agencies can subscribe to an “agency plan” that allows them to build complete and totally white-label mobile websites at a very low one-time cost while being free to resell them at the price they want.

Custom solutions and native apps development is another specialty of the company - whose aim is to bring the mobile web to small and medium businesses who do not want to afford huge investments and need an immediate and very positive return.

mob.is.it was founded in 2011 by Silvio Porcellana, a long time web entrepreneur who previously co-founded SEO Italy, one of the leading Italian SEO firms.
